passives.name: Safeguard
passives.effects: Become ''Safeguarded'' to reduce incoming champion damage by 50%, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from a champion (30 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).

effects_structured.raw: Become ''Safeguarded'' to reduce incoming champion damage by 50%, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from a champion (30 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).
